commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceOld: /** * This constructor prepares for creating a suggested FST using the * {@link #build(InputIterator)} method. * * @param buckets * The number of weight discretization buckets (see * {@link FSTCompletion} for details). * * @param exactMatchFirst * If true exact matches are promoted to the top of the * suggestions list. Otherwise they appear in the order of * discretized weight and alphabetical within the bucket. */ public FSTCompletionLookup(int buckets, boolean exactMatchFirst) { this.buckets = buckets; this.exactMatchFirst = exactMatchFirst; }
